entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Sheet Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 a.m. ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 3. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning this evening then changing to ice pellets or freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
